# The `TempDir` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A RAII object that creates a temporary directory upon initialization and removes it upon destruction. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::unittest::TempDir</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A RAII object that creates a temporary directory upon initialization and removes it upon destruction.

Definition at line 113 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/testing/include/llvm/testing/support/supporthelpers-h">SupportHelpers.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### TempDir() {#a3f25fef2d2bb1b2135cb46bc4d2611eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::unittest::TempDir::TempDir (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, bool Unique=false)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "explicit"]}>
Creates a managed temporary directory.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Name">The name of the directory to create.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Unique">If true, the directory will be created using <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#abf677459f5137cfb49f6d81b27ea54a1">llvm::sys::fs::createUniqueDirectory</a>.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
